Package services

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SchedulingService
    Implements scheduling service which is responsible for retrieving tweets from all the previous searched keywords every X amount of time
    SchedulingServiceTest
    Tests the functionality of Scheduling Service.
    TenTweetsForKeywordService
    Implements functionality of fetching 10 tweets based on search phrase.
    TenTweetsForKeywordServiceTest
    Implements JUnit test cases for 10 Tweets retrieval functionality.
    TwitterAuthenticator
    Service for retrieving a security token required for authentication when using Twitter API
    TwitterAuthenticatorTest
    Implements JUnit test cases for Twitter Authentication functionality.
    UserProfileService
    Implements the functionality to fetch user profile info and user's last ten tweets using Twitter API.
    UserProfileServiceTest
    Implements JUnit test cases for UserProfileService functionality.
